overview.Institute Name: Indraprastha Institute of Information Technology, Delhi
overview.address: Indraprastha Institute of Information Technology, Okhla Industrial Estate, Phase III, Near Govind Puri Metro Station, New Delhi - 110020

mode_of_admission.mode_of_admission: Candidates must appear for the JEE (Main) exam and apply separately for the JAC Delhi Counselling process.

fee_waiver.point 1: Merit-based Scholarships: Awarded to meritorious students based on specific criteria.
fee_waiver.point 2: For First Semester eligibility, candidates must secure a JEE (Main) AIR rank below 1000 to qualify for the 100% Tuition Fee scholarship, or between 1000 and 2000 for the 50% Tuition Fee scholarship.
fee_waiver.point 3: For eligibility from the Second Semester onwards, candidates must maintain a CGPA of 7.5 or higher.
fee_waiver.point 4: Women Empowerment Scholarships: Awarded to meritorious female students based on specific criteria.
fee_waiver.point 5: For First Semester eligibility, the top 100 female students who score more than 95% aggregate marks in the XII Board Exam will be considered for the 50% Tuition Fee scholarship.
fee_waiver.point 6: For eligibility from the Second Semester onwards, candidates must maintain a CGPA of 7.5 or higher.
fee_waiver.point 7: Merit-cum-Means Scholarships: Awarded to meritorious students based on performance and financial need, depending on the number of applications and the available budget for that particular year.
